title: Someone password-reset my account?
body: Sorry for the (possibly) misleading title, however last night I received the automatic email for a password reset on League and when I tried to login today I was unable. Does League have a system in place where it locks your account after a certain number of tries? Or did they somehow succeed? Anyway, it doesn't look like they have done anything whilst on it, and since then I have changed my password and the email address associated with the account. Sorry for the post, just wanted to get it out there, see if anybody else has had a similar issue.
